os.fullname: OS Independent (Written in an interpreted language)

name: Visual PLaSM plug-in for Eclipse 3.0.1
short_description:
A plug-in for Eclipse that allows modeling PLaSM programs in a visual environment. PLaSM is a geometric functional programming language. If you do want to try Visual PLaSM, you also need to download PLaSM here:
http://www.plasm.net/download/index.html
